intro.description: I design modern, responsive, and intuitive interfaces, combining accessibility, usability, and advanced web technologies.

about_me: Originally from Calvisano (Brescia), I have over 7 years of experience in the retail industry, including 5 years as a store manager and 2 years in sales, developing skills in leadership, B2B/B2C customer management, and organization. In 2023, I decided to pursue web development and completed a front-end developer course at 24Ore Business School, with expertise in HTML, CSS, JavaScript, TypeScript, Angular, and Ionic. I now reside in the province of Monza, ready to take on new challenges in the field of web development.

experience.moi_2024: Contributed to the development of a web application by improving its logic and user interface. Designed a new interface for managing delivery notes, integrated back-end APIs, implemented the Dynamsoft SDK for document scanning, and used AG Grid for dynamic tables. The work was carried out in a Docker environment.
experience.more_sales: Managed client acquisition and maintained relationships with existing customers. Prepared and updated sales price lists, achieved sales targets, and supported back-office activities.
experience.more_store_manager: Managed the setup and operation of two MoreCover stores at La Rinascente in Milan and Rome. Supervised two teams of 4 members, handling recruitment, selection, training, and onboarding of new employees. Achieved sales KPIs and ensured UV printer maintenance.

projects.moneychanger_description: Moneychanger is a web app that allows you to convert between different currencies. It is a responsive web application built with Angular, in a Docker environment.
